name: Philosophies of Kindling
description: Talent Level-Up material.  Offering up kindling is the established rule of the Nation of Pyro.  What is meant by offering kindling is to offer up a sacrifice before oneobtains something, though it does not always guarantee a response or return.Its true meaning lies in paying a price without expecting a reward — for inthe end, the day when the fruits will be reaped is sure to come.
